about_the_game:
The new car is not electric, nor is it a flying car. The new car is a one-button driving car. Everything wonderful that sounds is inversely proportional to the result of this new vehicle. To celebrate its launch, a racing championship for these vehicles is held with a prize of one million dollars for the winner.

Control the direction and speed of the car simultaneously with a single button. To turn you also accelerate and to accelerate you also turn, difficult to master but intuitive. Championship of 12 circuits with 5 selectable drivers with their own story. Local multiplayer mode with up to 4 players in split screen.

content_descriptors.notes: Personality of disrespectful and unethical characters from a humorous point of view.

detailed_description:
The new car is not electric, nor is it a flying car. The new car is a one-button driving car. Everything wonderful that sounds is inversely proportional to the result of this new vehicle. To celebrate its launch, a racing championship for these vehicles is held with a prize of one million dollars for the winner.

Control the direction and speed of the car simultaneously with a single button. To turn you also accelerate and to accelerate you also turn, difficult to master but intuitive. Championship of 12 circuits with 5 selectable drivers with their own story. Local multiplayer mode with up to 4 players in split screen.
name: Race Elcano

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher (Win64)
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher (Win64)
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (or greater) or AMD Radeon HD 7600 (or greater)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: The new car is not electric, nor is it a flying car. The new car is a one-button driving car. Control the direction and speed of the car simultaneously with a single button. To turn you also accelerate and to accelerate you also turn, difficult to master but intuitive.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
